author: luisfe
root_title: My Entry To  Shadow Hunters/SMASh Contest - Round 312
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmVavutKPGUbmvV1YPnSYdMj7QS8MBXStuSp74XRRKPtnC/20240304_163506.jpg


**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
Greetings, community, I hope that this week we all have the opportunity to hunt good shadows. The ones I bring today to show you I hunted at my friend's house, the teacher @carmencitavdc
https://images.ecency.com/DQmRsriT3U7s5u5yywFCVqVdkeWSXDFeDvyxtYH7B5C1er9/20240304_163513.jpg

They are bar shadows, with wide intersecting lines, they have diffuse contours and the color of both the floor and the walls provide them with a beautiful frame.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmeasEi5EiW2EXC9ZiNSd1ZiYbqLVSHZpnNL2GR11AePdf/20240304_163517.jpg

https://images.ecency.com/DQmPGA6HZ1SSCL7tGfktCo5zBHZiapehUqD9K8TVXsNF5Ck/20240304_163456.jpg

I hope you like these shadows.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmdKiRdiGVCGGmhF74mPdhQnvCWQy1HoP1sua6wdZgtRUU/20240304_163450.jpg

If you have not yet participated in this contest organized by @melinda010100, I invite you to do it. You will discover the beauty hidden in the shadows that did not catch your attention before.
You can read the contest rules by clicking [here]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-7a89cade5c0dc )

https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png

**Versi√≥n en castellano**
https://images.ecency.com/DQmVavutKPGUbmvV1YPnSYdMj7QS8MBXStuSp74XRRKPtnC/20240304_163506.jpg

Saludos, comunidad, espero que est√° semana todos tengamos la oportunidad de cazar buenas sombras. Las que traigo hoy para mostrar a ustedes las caf√© en casa de mi amiga, la maestra @carmencitavdc
https://images.ecency.com/DQmRsriT3U7s5u5yywFCVqVdkeWSXDFeDvyxtYH7B5C1er9/20240304_163513.jpg

Son sombras de barras, de l√≠neas anchas entrecruzadas, tienen contornos difusos y el color tanto del piso como de las paredes les brindan un bello marco.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmeasEi5EiW2EXC9ZiNSd1ZiYbqLVSHZpnNL2GR11AePdf/20240304_163517.jpg

Espero les gusten est√°s sombras.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmPGA6HZ1SSCL7tGfktCo5zBHZiapehUqD9K8TVXsNF5Ck/20240304_163456.jpg

https://images.ecency.com/DQmdKiRdiGVCGGmhF74mPdhQnvCWQy1HoP1sua6wdZgtRUU/20240304_163450.jpg

Si a√∫n no has participado en este concurso convocado por @melinda010100, te invito a que lo hagas. Descubrir√°s la belleza oculta en las sombras que antes no llamaban tu atenci√≥n.
Puedes leer las bases del concurso clicando [ac√°]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-7a89cade5c0dc )
https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png
###### Muchas gracias por visitar mi blog y leer mi post. Espero que esta sea una semana llena de cosas buenas para ti y tu familia. Dios te bendiga.
> ###### Thank you very much for visiting my blog and reading my post. I hope this be a week full of good things for you and your family. God bless you, ***
Please follow @hive.samadi because she helped pregnant mothers by giving them a meal
###
Your visit to my blog is very important to me, I hope you liked my photography work and leave with the intention of returning..

Fotos propias tomadas con celular Krip K55H /Own photos taken with Krip K55H Cell Phone

author: sayury

Saludos, comunidad. En este Mes de la Mujer quiero dedicar este momento de humor a todas las damas enamoradas con un mensaje medio en broma y medio en serio. es decir, en broma para que lo tomen en serio. Si adem√°s de hacerles sonre√≠r, con este mensaje logramos que se activen las antenitas de las damas para detectar ciertos esguinces en el vocabulario del gal√°n que las pretende y obrar en consecuencia ¬°Habr√° valido la pena! (O habr√° valido la risa) realizar este v√≠deo Canci√≥n original con el grupo Punto Seis. Recuerdos de 1973

author: cashheaven
root_title: Battle Mage Secrets: Possibilus being Wise, grabbing the Opportunity
body:
![BATTLE MAGE SECRETS EQUAL OPPORTUNITY](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/splinterlands/23wqduWJqYA9dFfUMaozFxeH2e83mjRT9UjJ3qrFex77AQcTQsM8bBmHR3iN6unb4DvQk.png) This week, I'm sharing my game in Equal Opportunity ruleset using Possibilus the Wise. ![EQUAL OPPORTUNITY weekly challenge](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23wMzGNb9yVDmdckdCM31aciv1oqxE6s3tcacQHHw1yXQmjN5NStUR9diTyn8tVPPaW2U.png) You can check out this [BATTLE MAGE SECRETS Weekly Challenge link](https://peakd.com/hive-13323/@splinterlands/battle-mage-secrets-weekly-challenge-s9xzix) if you also want to participate. ---
**Ruleset:** *Stampede* *Unprotected* *Equal Opportunity* **Mana Cap:** *43* **Elements:** *Fire,Water,Life,Dragon*
![Game Modifications](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/EoEo9yCVtZMq9GBjqZm3K9qWeLTXuAofc7hA6QgTkLH6PoAUfEgcR8ZgzeXC1etgXcd.png)
This is a [Stampede](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=26) ruleset game so The Trample ability can trigger multiple times per attack if the trampled Monster is killed. Higher HP and speed are the key in this ruleset. Dispel helps to remove Trample.
![Stampede](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/stampede.png)
This is an [Unprotected](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=31) ruleset game so Monsters do not have any armor and do not get armor from Abilities or Summoner Buffs. Protect, Piercing, Repair, Rust are useless. Focus on a tank with high HP and Heal.
![Unprotected](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/unprotected.png)
This is an [Equal Opportunity](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=8) ruleset game so All Monsters have the Opportunity ability. Speed and HP is the trick here: higher speed will let you target enemy's low HP monster first, opening the way for your slower monsters to deal damage to higher HP enemy monsters. Keep lower HP monsters in front. Monsters who have two attack types should always be preferred.
![Equal Opportunity](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/equal-opportunity.png)
--- ![Let the battle begin!](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23tvCb1WwYecS9T6eD7hALRKZMHNA1vD9jJELMB6ByMm9SRfyf1eW553Rz1mZgHfvQchN.png) You may also [watch battle here](https://splinterlands.com/?p=battle&id=sl_34763308a41c7447be97dc7d3c8ecfae). ---
Summoner: **Possibilus the Wise** Abilities: All friendly monsters gain +2 health All friendly monsters gain [Trample](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=58) ability All friendly monsters gain [Reach](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=10) ability
![Possibilus the Wise](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Possibilus%20the%20Wise_lv4.png) ---
Pos 1 Monster: **Baakjira** Abilities: [Void](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=12) - Reduced damage from Magic attacks Attack damage gets halved (rounded up), except attack 1 which deals 0 damage [Slow](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=21) - Reduces the Speed of all enemy Monsters [Strengthen](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=29) - All friendly Monsters have increased Health [Heal](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=7) - Restores a portion of the Monster's health each round Restores 1/3 of the max health, rounded down.
![Baakjira](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Baakjira_lv4.png) ---
Pos 2 Monster: **Coastal Sentry** Abilities: [Double Strike](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=17) - It attacks twice each round. [Piercing](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=15) - If Melee or Ranged attack damage is in excess of the target's Armor, the remainder will damage the target's Health
![Coastal Sentry](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/soulbound/Coastal%20Sentry_lv7.png) ---
Pos 3 Monster: **Venari Marksrat** Abilities: [Martyr](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=99) - When this Monster dies, adjacent Monsters get +1 to all stats [Snare](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=35) - When attacking enemies with Flying, removes the Flying ability and cannot miss.
![Venari Marksrat](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/soulbound/Venari%20Marksrat_lv5_gold.png) ---
Pos 4 Monster: **Deeplurker** Abilities: [Opportunity](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=31) - It may attack from any position and will target the enemy Monster with the lowest health. [Poison](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=64) - Attacks have a chance to apply poison, which does automatic damage to the target at the beginning of each round after the poison is applied. The Poison ability is triggered 50% of the time. Poison does damage at the end of the turn and is not affected by shield or void. [Demoralize](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=28) - Reduces the Melee attack of all enemy Monsters -1 to melee attack, it cannot be less than 1
![Deeplurker](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Deeplurker_lv10.png) ---
Pos 5 Monster: **River Hellondale** Abilities: [Resurrect](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=13) - When a friendly Monster dies it is brought back to life with 1 Health. This ability can only trigger once per battle [Inspire](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=11) - Gives all friendly Monsters +1 Melee attack. [Dispel](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=66) - When this monster hit an enemy, it clears all positive status effects on that enemy
![River Hellondale](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/River%20Hellondale_lv4.png) ---
Pos 6 Monster: **Angelic Mandarin** Abilities: [Triage](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=26) - Heals the friendly back-line Monster that has taken the most damage Heal is max health divided by 3, rounded down. Minimum is 2. [Silence](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=19) - Reduces the Magic Attack of all enemy Monsters
![Angelic Mandarin](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Angelic%20Mandarin_lv8.png) --- Now that Rebellion edition is here, do you think there's a stronger line up in this Game Modification? Comment down below. You may also [watch battle here](https://splinterlands.com/?p=battle&id=sl_34763308a41c7447be97dc7d3c8ecfae). --- Hope you learned something from my game and how I came up with this lineup. What would you have done differently given the same ruleset, mana cap and active elements? Let us know by dropping a comment. --- Want to play Splinterlands with me? [Play with me](https://splinterlands.com?ref=cashheaven) Make passive income by renting out your card collection in [peakmonsters](peakmonsters.com) Earn on your blogs. Blog with us here in [Hive](https://peakd.com/register?ref=cashheaven) Earn passive income by sharing your internet bandwidth with [Honeygain](https://r.honeygain.me/JONAS2EC92) Earn while you search the internet with [Presearch](https://presearch.com/signup?rid=4389909) If you are looking for a charity to donate to, please consider [Food for Hungry Minds](https://foodforhungryminds.org/donate/). ###### Card images are owned and open-sourced by Splinterlands.io
Still need help with Excel and Google Sheets? Get Instant Expert Help in Fiverr or PeoplePerHour platforms. Click one icon below.
[![Get Instant Expert Help on Fiverr](https://images.hive.blog/DQmfAqRq3mZ42YqnphxXRpKMtfG15eLf79gEDK6dibsByyE/image.png)](https://www.fiverr.com/share/ey8E6m "Excel Expert Help") [![Get Instant Expert Help in PeoplePerHour](https://images.hive.blog/DQmctPstE9Xkp5drV9aKguRA8guU5rbCTvVSSBZGo3r36be/image.png)](https://www.peopleperhour.com/hourlie/give-instant-expert-help-with-excel-and-google-sheets/712968?ref=member "Google Sheets Help")
We can also accept [LEO](https://leofinance.io/@leoglossary/leoglossary-leo "LEO crypto token"), [HIVE](https://leofinance.io/@leoglossary/leoglossary-usdhive "HIVE crypto token"), [HBD](https://leofinance.io/@leoglossary/leoglossary-hive-backed-dollar-hbd "HBD Hive backed dollar") tokens as payment if we transact directly here in HIVE network. Please follow @hive.samadi because she helped pregnant mothers by giving them a meal. Follow @advertisingbot2

author: carmencitavdc
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ZJH1-AEfHk

Hola, comunidad, motivada por el hecho de que el mes de marzo tiene tres fechas muy importantes: el D√≠a de la Mujer (en Venezuela), el inicio de la primavera y el D√≠a de la Poes√≠a, escrib√≠ un poema: Marzo cinco letras que encierran tanto: perfume de mujer flores amarillas canto de pasi√≥n. Flama ardiente de un horizonte trasl√∫cido donde se refleja el alma Brisa c√°lida que roza las mejillas Y el suave murmullo de las letras al o√≠do
https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/hermaryrc/EnyvkDRHLBL8AxruQpFTKBz3kDSS6t93Tdhp6hcukRYgpcRutKTD3EmnDP4XD3JGoPP.png

>Hello community, motivated by the fact that the month of March has three very important dates: Women's Day (in Venezuela), the beginning of spring and Poetry Day, I wrote a poem: >March five letters that They contain so much: women perfume yellow flowers song of passion >burning flame of a translucent horizon where the soul is reflected > warm breeze that rubs the cheeks And the soft murmur of the letters in the ear
https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/hermaryrc/EnyvkDRHLBL8AxruQpFTKBz3kDSS6t93Tdhp6hcukRYgpcRutKTD3EmnDP4XD3JGoPP.png

Gracias por tu visita .
Thank you for your visit.
El texto fue creado con mi inteligencia natural. No es fruto de inteligencia artificial IA

author: advertisingbot2
root_title: Hive Marketing Campaign 240305 Week 10 For Hive.samadi
body:
Hello everyone who wants to earn some small money,

here I announce the next advertising contest for week 10 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2024-03-05 to 2024-03-13.

![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

---

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23zbKpafXUuXqcgN1UqE4ELLLjBk6HWR7VCHXMBWeuuhHvjVr9V26Vu632H51AX3QEB1Q.png)

## Advertising Text:
**"Please follow @hive.samadi because she helped pregnant mothers by giving them a meal"**

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/EpnDF7XjUzRvHbukYSaPzgLofEeP2bKekjBmuA9oo8mHW8BAv1i1sGfdg5fHShUuuSn.png)

In her post https://peakd.com/hive-174578/@hive.samadi/providing-a-nutritious-diet-to-pregnant-mothers she describes, how she helped people in need.


# The Reward

The first 10 Hive users, that do this, will get 2.000 Hive each short after the end of the campaign.


# Does it work?
Yes. We did it before. Here is the proof:

* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-24021601-week-7-for-awuahbenjamin-hive-154303 

* https://peakd.com/advertising/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-23120401 

* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-marketing-campaing-23111001

* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-advertising-contest-from-last-week

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23vrtfBe9soddee9UwH688PMyJYa2GjTPDpiV9s9mAwMHwp7AWurWJanpDDMtpQJx9z89.png)

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/23wghGTaUFS6SsidPJ6d5QqyM3cxpzSj2PMQ8r2XZSWHeBAi2jC4e7JdmyTWL8DbtYTpc.png)

# Inviting Former Members
Hi @barbyjr, @luisfe, @azabache2021, @sayury, @lunafrances, @elioe, @orlandobello, @oasiskp2, @cashheaven, @fjworld, @rubyjosleidy27,
what do you think? Do you want to join the campaign again?

# Status of this project

The last week I worked on some tools to automatecally read posts from Hive, download them and put them to an AI assistat. There they are checked for charity and hatespeech content. The prototype of this already works.

---

![Questions.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKKRqJt1qnuNodPEACGiuC9iauEfvSWwo3w9ACbwELDzPg5VpvwJCsfsA8ptwYH.png)

*[origin of some images](https://photofunia.com/)*
